title: Scholarship Management System
description: Developed a comprehensive platform using Next.js to streamline scholarship applications, reviews, and approvals, enhancing accessibility for students and administrators.
longDescription: Developed a comprehensive platform using Next.js to streamline scholarship applications, reviews, and approvals, enhancing accessibility for students and administrators.

title: Repeto
description: Created a dynamic platform to aggregate recurring opportunities like scholarships, hackathons, research positions, and internships, empowering users to discover and track opportunities effortlessly.
longDescription: Created a dynamic platform to aggregate recurring opportunities like scholarships, hackathons, research positions, and internships, empowering users to discover and track opportunities effortlessly.

title: GECian Archive
description: Developed a dedicated platform for GEC Palakkad students to showcase and archive their projects, fostering a culture of collaboration and innovation within the institution.
longDescription: Developed a dedicated platform for GEC Palakkad students to showcase and archive their projects, fostering a culture of collaboration and innovation within the institution.

title: Kerala Food Spot
description: Developed a Telegram bot to guide users to authentic dishes and restaurants in Kozhikode city, enhancing culinary exploration for locals and tourists alike.
longDescription: Developed a Telegram bot to guide users to authentic dishes and restaurants in Kozhikode city, enhancing culinary exploration for locals and tourists alike.

title: Kerala Tourist Spot
description: Created a platform to highlight famous and hidden tourist spots in Kerala, providing travelers with curated information to enrich their travel experiences.
longDescription: Created a platform to highlight famous and hidden tourist spots in Kerala, providing travelers with curated information to enrich their travel experiences.

title: Food Blog Website
description: Developed a vibrant food blog platform as part of the StackUp challenge by TinkerHub, enabling food enthusiasts to share recipes, reviews, and culinary stories.
longDescription: Developed a vibrant food blog platform as part of the StackUp challenge by TinkerHub, enabling food enthusiasts to share recipes, reviews, and culinary stories.

title: Check Power of 2
description: Developed an NPM package that efficiently determines if a number is a power of 2, providing developers with a reliable utility for mathematical computations.
longDescription: Developed an NPM package that efficiently determines if a number is a power of 2, providing developers with a reliable utility for mathematical computations.

title: Nemini Electric Website
description: Customized an HTML template to create a professional website for Nemini Electric, enhancing their online presence and accessibility to customers.
longDescription: Customized an HTML template to create a professional website for Nemini Electric, enhancing their online presence and accessibility to customers.

title: Laptop Price Predictor - Clone
description: Implemented a machine learning model to predict laptop prices based on specifications, following a YouTube tutorial to enhance my ML skills.
longDescription: Implemented a machine learning model to predict laptop prices based on specifications, following a YouTube tutorial to enhance my ML skills.

title: Ethical Hacking Guide
description: Compiled a repository containing curated videos and concise notes to facilitate learning in ethical hacking, developed under the cybersecurity club.
longDescription: Compiled a repository containing curated videos and concise notes to facilitate learning in ethical hacking, developed under the cybersecurity club.

title: Face Shape Predictor
description: Developed a machine learning model to predict face shapes, enhancing applications in personalized recommendations and virtual try-on systems.
longDescription: Developed a machine learning model to predict face shapes, enhancing applications in personalized recommendations and virtual try-on systems.

title: Tech Expert
description: Developed a Telegram bot that actively shares great tech deals during sales festivals, assisting users in making informed purchasing decisions.
longDescription: Developed a Telegram bot that actively shares great tech deals during sales festivals, assisting users in making informed purchasing decisions.
